author: michele-mormile
body:
#### PR description:

I am adding a GenFilter whose use is to select events with at least 1 GenPhoton after Parton Showering with Pythia. This is needed to produce NLO samples enriched in photons, as for tW + photons from decay (cfr. https://indico.cern.ch/event/1293201/contributions/5434786/attachments/2659639/4606878/twa_sample_generation.pdf ;
https://its.cern.ch/jira/projects/CMSTOPMCREQ/issues/CMSTOPMCREQ-33?filter=allopenissues&orderby=cf%5B14808%5D+ASC%2C+priority+DESC%2C+updated+DESC)

#### PR validation:

I have tested that adding the GenFilter to the generation workflow does obtain the expected result of only selecting events with GenPhotons. 
The runTheMatrix workflow passed all the tests except for 1000.0_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+TIER0+SKIMD+HARVESTDfst2+ALCASPLIT
11834.0_TTbar_14TeV+2021PU+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSimINPUT+DigiPU+RecoNanoPU+HARVESTNanoPU


#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

I would like this PR to be backported to CMSSW_10_6 as it needs to be used for generating UL Run 2 samples
title: GenFilter for selecting events with GenPhotons (based from right branch)
